_sText:
To get ammo for the T weapons, press F2 when in a buy zone. It should restock your ammunition.

To get the most out of this map: 

Make sure console is enabled by going into options>controls>advanced and tick 'Enable developer console'

Load the map with 30 Terrorist bots

In the console (press ~ below escape) type mp_autoteambalance 0   press enter, then type  mp_limitteams 99   and press enter

You may want to disable weapons for the bots, untick all the bot's weapon choices before you create the match.
